method.name: getGroup
method.description: * The group of the module this dependency specification refers to. * * @return the module group name

method.name: getName
method.description: * The name of the module this dependency specification refers to. * * @return the module name

method.name: getVersion
method.description: * The version range of the module this dependency specification refers to. * * @return the module version range

property.description: * The name of the module this dependency specification refers to. * * @return the module name

property.name: version
